description: Find out how you can receive BBC Weather via the red button on your digital television box or digital set top box.
title: Interactive TV
maintext:
Do you want to get an update on the weather when you want?
Well, you can using the BBC Red Button service on your digital television.
Whether you have Freeview, Freesat, Sky TV or Virgin Media, you can catch up with the the latest weather maps and warnings.
To receive these services, simply press the RED button on your handset.
